title: Authenticated->Hide Scores On - Reveal Highlights
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account

Hide Scores is ON
custom_steps: WHEN we activate the Reveal Highlights button
custom_expected: THEN the Recent Highlights and Team News video thumbnails are displayed for as long as you remain on the Home screen

title: Authenticated -> App Launch -> Home View
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
2. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Home page
custom_expected:
User should able to launch the app, see the landing page with MLB logo in the upper left side and the "MENU" option along with current date in the top right side of the screen.

The left side of the main screen area should have the details of the recent fixture of the "Favorite team" along with the upcoming fixtures for that team. User should have an option to select in the dropdown the "Followed Teams" or any other team's to get their fixture details.

The right side of the main screen area should have "Recent Highlights" and "Team News" columns with respective video thumbnails.

title: Authenticated-> Home View ->Recent Highlights and Team News
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the MLB App from Samsung Apps
2. User should Login with a valid account
3. "Home View" is selected in the Settings>Select App Start View. 
4. Favorite team is selected in the Settings>Change your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User click Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Settings option
4. User Clicks on Select App Start View option to toggle between "Home View" and "Scores View"
5. User navigates to Home page
WHEN the user access the Home View Screen
custom_expected:
On this screen, the user will also see the most recent highlights and Team News pertaining to the current favorite team
THEN the user will be presented with the most up to date information and videos of the user's current favorite team listed under two

sections: Recent Highlights and Team News.

title: Authenticated-> Home View Screen-> Hide Scores OFF, All data for the current game will display, as well as, the most recent highlight and Team News Videos
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
2. User should Login with a valid account
3. "Home View" is selected in the Settings>Select App Start View. 
4. Favorite team is selected in the Settings>Change your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Settings option
4. User selects Hide Scores "OFF" 
WHEN the user accesses the Home View Screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to see all relevant information including: highlights, news, and the most current game regarding their current

favorite team

title: Authenticated-> Home View-> With Hide Scores ON-> the current game tile will only display the team logos with a message explaining the Hide Scores is ON
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
"Home View" is selected in the Settings>Select App Start View. 
Favorite team is selected in the Settings>Change your Favorite Teams
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Settings option
4. User selects Hide scores "ON"
5. User navigates to Home page
WHEN the user accesses the Team View Screen
custom_expected:
THEN the current game title will display FINAL plus the two team logos.
Bottom of the screen user should see the Future game details

ALSO under the Recent Highlights and Team News main title will display the below message:

Hide Scores: ON 
In-game and recent highlights display here. MLB.TV hides them based on your Setting. Select below to reveal temporarily. Or, shows scores by enabling in 'Settings'.
Button: Reveal Highlights

title: Authenticated ->Home->Verify Today's date is correct
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
2. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
User launches the MLB App
User should be on Home page

WHEN we have Home screen displayed 
AND we observe the upper Right corner of the screen 
    a. Check after 10am ET
    b. Check before 10am ET 

Note: Day change is at 10 am Eastern
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the date is correct
    a. Today's date is shown
    b. Yesterday's date is shown

title: Authenticated->Home->Verify data updates within 90 seconds
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account

Select a team from the Team Picker that has a game starting soon (within 10 minutes or so)
custom_steps:
User launches the MLB App
User should be on Home page

WHEN we are on the Home Screen 
AND the state of the Live Broadcast changes (e.g., from pre-game to warmup; from warmup to live)
custom_expected:
THEN the Game tile will refresh within 90 seconds 
AND the status display will update accordingly 

> NOTE: game tiles are enabled if media is tagged with Media_On

title: Unauthenticated -> App Launch -> Home View
custom_preconds: User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User click the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Home page
custom_expected:
User should able to launch the app, see the landing page with MLB logo in the upper left side and the "MENU" option along with current date in the top right side of the screen.

The left side of the main screen area should have the details of the recent fixture of the "Favorite team" along with the upcoming fixtures for that team. User should have an option to select in the dropdown the "Followed Teams" or any other team's to get their fixture details.

The right side of the main screen area should have "Recent Highlights" and "Team News" columns with respective video thumbnails.

title: Unauthenticated->Home->Verify Today's date is correct
custom_preconds: User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
custom_steps:
User launches the MLB App
User should be on Home page

WHEN we have Home screen displayed 
AND we observe the upper Right corner of the screen 
    a. Check after 10am ET
    b. Check before 10am ET 

Note: Day change is at 10 am Eastern
custom_expected:

title: Authenticated -> Scores Page
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores tab
custom_expected:
User should see the landing page with MLB logo in the upper left side, a date picker in the top middle (defaulted to current date), and the "MENU" option along with current date in the top right side of the screen.

The main screen area should be filled with current fixtures / games along with the respective scores for that selected day.

The scores for these fixtures will be shown or hidden based on the option selected in the Settings for "Hide Scores".

title: Authenticated->Scores->Verify Scores opens to the current date
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
Hide Scores should be OFF in Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN we bring up the Global Navigation Menu
AND we select the Scores screen
custom_expected:
THEN the Scores screen is displayed
AND today's date is shown in the date picker
AND there are navigational arrows on either side of today's date to move backwards (<) and forwards (>) in the schedule
AND tiles for all of the games scheduled  today are displayed

title: Authenticated ->Scores-> Game Watch Options (LIVE)
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE game tile
custom_expected:
THEN a modal is shown with different ways (both Video and Audio options) to watch/listen to the game. The options include AWAY and HOME TV channels to watch along with Audio options below them. 

AND the Live game scores are displayed at the top of the modal.

title: Authenticated ->Scores-> Playback option (LIVE)
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
Should not be a Blackout game
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE game tile
6. Click on Away or Home option
7. User selects "START FROM THE BEGINNING" and "Watch Live" options
custom_expected:
THEN a modal is shown with "START FROM THE BEGINNING" and "Watch Live" options
If the user selects "START FROM THE BEGINNING" then Playback starts streaming.
If the user selects "Watch Live" then the modal is shown with different options and if any option is selected then Playback starts streaming.

title: Authenticated -> Scores -> Verify that Game Data updates/refreshes every 30 seconds
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu 
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores tab

WHEN a team scores OR a game state changes
custom_expected: THEN the data will be properly refreshes within 30 seconds of the data becoming available

title: Authenticated-> Verify Standings
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the remote
3. Click on Standings tab
custom_expected:
User should see the Divisional Standings page
AND Wild Card Standings

title: Authenticated->(Live Game!) Play: Verify user is able to play LIVE video over a wireless connection
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
The TV is connected to the Internet via a wireless connection
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed (Home only valid in Production environment)
AND we attempt to play the live feed
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully 
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Authenticated->(Live Game!) Play: User chooses "START FROM THE BEGINNING" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to stream a live game from either the Home or Scores screen (playing from Home screen only valid in Production environment)
AND we select a feed 
AND we select "START FROM THE BEGINNING"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start 
AND the location will be at the beginning of the broadcast

title: Authenticated->(Live Game!) Play: User chooses "WATCH LIVE" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to stream a live game from either the Home or Scores screen (playing from Home only valid in Production environment)
AND we select a feed 
AND we select "Watch Live"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start 
AND the location will be at the current LIVE location 

**User will have been placed into the Linear feed by choosing Live**

title: Authenticated->(Archived OR Live) Video: Verify incremental Rewind speed
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a video stream 
AND we attempt to Rewind 
AND we press the REW control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the REW speed should increment accordingly (x2, x4, x8, x16, x32)

title: Authenticated->(Archived OR Live) Video: Verify incremental Fast Forward speed
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a video stream 
AND we attempt to Fast Forward 
AND we press the FF control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the FF speed should increment accordingly (x2, x4, x8, x16, x32)

title: Authenticated->(Archived OR Live) CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "On"
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we access a video stream 
AND playback begins
custom_expected:
THEN we can turn Closed Captioning ON

Note: Closed Captioning is enabled/disabled from the Samsung TV's Settings menu: Settings > General > Accessibility

title: Authenticated->(Archived OR Live) CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "Off"
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
Closed Captioning is OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN we begin video playback 
AND we turn on Closed Captioning 
AND we attempt to turn OFF Closed Captioning

Note: Closed Captioning is enabled/displayed from the Samsung TV's Settings menu: Settings > General > Accessibility
custom_expected: THEN Closed Captioning will stop appearing for the video feed

title: Authenticated->(Live) Selecting a milestone jumps to that point in the video
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we stream a game
AND we bring up the Milestones view of the In-Player Navigation UI
AND we scroll through the milestones and select one
custom_expected: THEN the video jumps to that milestone and starts playback from that point

title: Authenticated->(Archived OR Live) Milestone text and markers align
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we stream a game
AND we bring up the Milestones in the In-Player Navigation UI
custom_expected: THEN we see a text tile for each milestone marker on the progress bar

title: Authenticated->(Live Game!) View Batting stats
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we watch a live game
AND we view the Box Score in the In-Player Video UI
custom_expected: THEN we see the Batting stats

title: Authenticated->(Live Game!) View Pitching stats
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we watch a live game
AND we view the Box Score in the In-Player Video UI
AND we switch to the Pitching view
custom_expected: THEN we see the Pitching stats for the game

title: Authenticated->(Live Game!) Edge Case: Entering a Mid-roll during its playback
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
User should Login with a valid Account
custom_steps: WHEN a live game is launched during the playback of mid-roll ads
custom_expected: THEN the ads play normally to the end of the ad break

title: Unauthenticated->Feed->Verify ordering of the LIVE Game Feeds
custom_preconds: User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE game tile

WHEN we open a Feed Select for a live game
custom_expected: THEN we will see the video feeds offered 1st (Home & Away)

title: Unauthenticated->Feed-> Verify HOME video feed plays
custom_preconds: User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE/VOD game tile

WHEN we launch HOME feed for LIVE
AND we launch a HOME archive feed
custom_expected: THEN the video should play

title: Unauthenticated->Feed-> Verify AWAY video feed plays
custom_preconds: User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE /VOD game tile

WHEN we launch the AWAY feed of a Live Game
AND we then launch the AWAY feed of an Archive Game
custom_expected:
THEN the video should play
THEN the video should play

title: Unauthenticated->(Live Game!) Hide Scores Off - Live
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
Hide Scores is OFF
There is a game in progress
The game is not subject to blackout
custom_steps:
WHEN we view Home Team page
AND select one of the teams currently playing

title: Unauthenticated-> Verify Standings
custom_preconds: User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App
2. User press Back button on the remote
3. Click on Standings tab
custom_expected:
User should see the Divisional Standings page
AND Wild Card Standings

title: Unauthenticated->(Live Game!) Game Start: In Progress (Live)
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
Need an in-progress (Live) game
custom_steps:
WHEN the Game State is set to "In Progress (Live)"
AND we view the Scores screen
custom_expected:
THEN we will see "LIVE" in blue text on the game tile between the team records
AND the text will be below the current score (or '@' symbol if the game is still in warmups)

title: Unauthenticated->(Live Game!) Game Start: In Progress (Live)
custom_preconds:
User should download the MLB App from Samsung App store
Find an in-progress (Live) game
Select one of the teams involved from the Team Picker
custom_steps:
WHEN the Game State is set to "In Progress (Live)"
AND we are on the Home screen
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a white banner in the top 1/6 of the Hero tile
AND the banner will contain the team logos and records
AND the banner will contain the current score
AND "Live" in white text (on a background corresponding to the home team's colors) and the current inning will be displayed below the score
AND the remainder of the Hero tile will display the current state of the game
